title: News24.com | Zwelinzima Vavi tests positive for Covid-19
description: SA Federation of Trade Unions general secretary Zwelinzima Vavi has tested positive for Covid-19.
content:
SA Federation of Trade Unions (Saftu) general secretary Zwelinzima Vavi has tested positive for Covid-19.
He told eNCA during an interview on Thursday that he had no idea how he was exposed to the novel coronavirus.
Vavi said he was tested for the virus on … [+1084 chars]
